text: Hi, can someone from HubSpot please check a blog post for me to see if there's a "frozen" cache bug? I can't seem to get the cookie scanner to realize it's a new page and I'm running out of attempts
any cms-react stuff announced at Inbound?

Hey Andrey -

No specific announcements from Inbound, however we have some exciting things we are currently working on that I can mention here:

• "Modules in Partials"
    ◦ React DnD Areas for use in Partials
    ◦ Can render Default and other HubL modules from inside a "React Partial"
• Unified local dev server
    ◦ Full local dev with a Unified React Theme
• Documentation and Guide improvements
• Video Component
If you are someone who is interested in trying Modules in Partials, let us know as that will likely have a private beta testing period.
awesome. unified dev server sounds like it'll be really helpful if it's what I'm imagining
does the video component support vimeo or youtube embeds?
